column4: im on 9.10 and i want to upgrate to lucid beta 1. when running "update-manager -d" and trying to update i have to download about 1.5 Gb of files. but if i have the live cd for 10.04 can i use that just to install over my current 9.10?
1) #ubuntu+1 for 10.04 support and discussion, 2) You can reinstall with a LiveCD, you need an alternate CD for upgrades.
